itemDisplayName: A sample to deploy Ubuntu VM , install docker-ce and deploy Aqua CSP container, and add all Azure Container Registries to Aqua console using CustomScript Extension
description: This template deployed: Ubuntu VM,Storage account,Public IP address,Network interface, VNET. Then installs docker-ce, deploys Aqua CSP container and adds all the Azure container registries to Aqua console
summary: A template for deploying Ubuntu VM and resources on Azure and deploy Aqua CSP container
